ModMetaData.name: More Factions and Xenotypes - Dreadfleet
ModMetaData.author: doll
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Dreadfleet faction (and their associated xenotypes to the game) - an ultratech pirate faction which has very compact but dangerous raids and an increased chance of being chosen the higher your colony wealth (the same as mechanoids). Contains no new items, research, animals, mechs, etc.
